DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate immunogenicity , mean cell mediate immunity ( CMI ) hemagglutination inhibition ( HI ) assay , also safety MF59C.1-adjuvanted subunit influenza vaccine compare conventional subunit vaccine previously unvaccinated child age 6 < 36 month .
DOC.brief_title: Humoral Cell Mediated Immunity Safety MF59C.1-adjuvanted Subunit Influenza Vaccine Conventional Subunit Influenza Vaccine Previously Unvaccinated Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male female previously unvaccinated healthy child age 6 < 36 month . Any known suspected impairment immune system , serious disease . Any subject receive licensed vaccine within 2 week ( inactivated vaccine ) 4 week ( live vaccine ) prior enrollment study . Individuals influenza vaccine document suspected influenza disease prior day 1 .
